abstract: The Eagles seized the top spot on the sales charts this week thanks to an 11th-hour change by a music trade magazine.
snippet: The Eagles seized the top spot on the sales charts this week thanks to an 11th-hour change by a music trade magazine.
lead_paragraph: In the latest indication of the clout of mass retailers, the Eagles, the longtime rock group that is selling its new studio album exclusively through Wal-Mart, seized the top spot on the sales charts this week thanks to an 11th-hour change by a music trade magazine that has stirred up a ruckus in the music industry.

headline.main: A Trade Publication Alters a Rule, Lifting an Eagles Album to No. 1
headline.print_headline: A Trade Publication Alters a Rule, Lifting an Eagles Album to No. 1
